name: CLINT Command Interface to System Calls
short_description: System calls command line utilties for Linux and all POSIX based operating systems. Allows direct command line access to many popular kernel system calls in text format. Makes a great internals teaching tool for operating systems.

screenshots.caption: clint-sc adds direct system calls to your shell scripts.
